mapper.select: select * from user_info u inner join par p on u.id = p.id

select u.id, u.name, u.phone_number, u.adress, u.gender, u.birthday, u.user_code, u.email, p.personality, p.etc, p.c_name, p.c_age , p.c_gender from user_info u inner join par p on u.id = p.id where u.id = #{value}
mapper.update: update user_info set password = NVL(#{password}, password), phone_number = NVL(#{phoneNumber}, phone_number), adress = NVL(#{adress}, adress), email = NVL(#{email}, email) where id = #{id}
update par set personality = NVL(#{personality}, personality), etc = NVL(#{etc}, etc), c_age = NVL(#{CAge}, c_age) where id = #{id}
